mapper.select: select client_user_code clientUserCode, order_code orderCode, goods_code goodsCode, goods_name goodsName, amout amount, allprice allPrice, price from t_sys_order_detaile where order_code = #{orderCode}
mapper.update: update t_sys_order set order_status = #{orderStatus}, update_time = now(), update_user = #{userId}, version = version + 1 where order_code = #{orderCode}
